website_summaries.verdict: Boasting ultra-realistic features, a stylish design, and various battery powered appliances, this luxury kitchen set has everything little chefs could possibly ask for, and won't quickly be outgrown.
pros: Beautifully designed with fine detailing to look and feel just like a real kitchen
Jam-packed with life-like features, including a large oven and fridge with working lights, farm-style kitchen sink, cabinets, and shelves
Comes with loads of fun accessories, from electronic appliances and cookware to utensils and groceries
Generous size is ideal for group play and suits a variety of ages
cons: Large size, lots of pieces, and no pre-drilled holes can make assembly a time-consuming task

customer_reviews.title: Best Play Kitchen Out There
customer_reviews.text: Hands down one of the best play kitchen sets out there! Took some time to put together but the directions were quite easy to follow. I was having a hard time trying to find a kitchen that would be big enough for our 5 yr old. This set is the perfect height and size, even my husband enjoys playing at it with our son! Christmas morning was a huge success! We unfortunately did receive a broken piece within the set that will hopefully get replaced by the manufacturer. I have not reached out to them yet. One of the handles could not be screwed on properly because of the broken piece. Minor issue, but will need to be addressed.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda S.

customer_reviews.title: lOVE IT, BUT....
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a parent who has much money to throw around, however I wanted something VERY special for my daughter birthday. The kitchen is big and with lots of things to play. Cons: The handles brake very fast, within a week.
customer_reviews.author: Arabella

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Great Christmas gift! My 4 year old absolutely loved this kitchen! Amazing!! And it only took two of us 2.5hrs to put together!
customer_reviews.author: april s.

customer_reviews.title: Super fun!
customer_reviews.text: My grandfather bought this for my (at the time)16 month old for Christmas. It's huge but so much fun! She absolutely loves it and will play with it for an hour easily without getting bored. She's still a big short to be able to use all the shelves and cabinets but she sure does enjoy what she can get to. The stove top has a blender and popcorn maker than when you put on the stove pops the popcorn (which is so funny to a little one) and the blender spins the inside in circles just like a true blender.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Great investment!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought my grandaughter the Step 2 walk in kitchen for her 2nd birthday and just upgraded to the new Step 2.. This this is awesome!!!! I put it together in 3 hours myself.. Grandaughter loves this thing.. It's pretty impressive.. You want to make someone a happy camper?? Invest in this kitchen center.. It's a bit pricey but we'll worth the money....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves it! Which is all that matters. However, get your screw gun ready for some serious assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas J.

customer_reviews.title: Playtime all the Time
customer_reviews.text: The plastic inserts for the door handles need to be more stable. I broke one and had to do some adjustments. Other than that, great little kitchen...my Granddaughter plays with it all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Tom Carter

customer_reviews.title: So much fun
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this set!!!! I’m 30 and love playing with it lol the frig lights up the over has a light that it looks like it’s getting hot and baking omg it’s so cool totally worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Moe

customer_reviews.title: So Much Fun!
customer_reviews.text: My husband had no problem assembling it. The oven does not connect to make the light go on, but that may just be from not setting it up entirely correctly. It's a really neat kitchen. Lots of things to do. I love the sizzling frying pan, bubbling pot, blender and pop corn. All are interactive and entertainingneven for me as an adult lol.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: This kitchen is what dreams are made of. It’s AMAZING! My 3 kids, ages 4,2,1 absolutely love it. Took my handy hubby about an hour to put together. We highly recommend this. My kids will love this for years to come. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kurt

customer_reviews.title: MISSING PARTS!! :(
customer_reviews.text: This is the most expensive little kitchen I have ever purchased. I was so excited to put it together for my Grandbabies playroom To my dismay the stove top pieces were missing and a handle and 2 long screws that were needed to put it together. I have contacted customer service - but I have not heard anything back. I’m so discouraged and would give this kitchen 5 stars IF it came with all the parts and customer service was better. So buyer beware -
customer_reviews.author: EC

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: Was average. A little pricey for what you get. It’s enough things for my twins to do without them being on top of each other. Also wished there were more electronic accessories
customer_reviews.author: Faiza Khan

customer_reviews.title: Hard to put together
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were unclear and hard to understand. If the fridge & oven doors are open. It is easily tipped.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly fun kitchen with so much to do. My girls are always playing with it
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: It is not easy to damage. That makes me very happy. My powerful children also feel happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Stone

customer_reviews.title: Amazing play Kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the coolest play kitchen ever! Even the teenagers that come in wanna play with it.lol
customer_reviews.author: latosha

customer_reviews.title: Perfect kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Kitchen was as described. My grandkids love it. Great size for a 5 and 3 year old. Fun accessories that keep the grandkids busy!
customer_reviews.author: Lj

customer_reviews.title: 5 STARS
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my Granddaughter. She absolutely loved it. Took some time to put together, so be patient. This gift is definitely 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Rene Burcina

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts
customer_reviews.text: This was an expensive purchase disappointed it had a damaged glass in refrigerator plus missing two other items
customer_reviews.author: DIANE NORRIS

customer_reviews.title: Mostly satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Love this kitchen but we have only had it put together for two days and the refrigerator light has already stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Penny Owens

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen set
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a Christmas gift for my grandchildren. They love it. They play with it almost everyday
customer_reviews.author: Debbie B

customer_reviews.title: Best play kitchen by far
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old LOVES this kitchen!! Especially the lights in the fridge and oven and also the blender and popcorn maker swirling!!
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Dietrich

customer_reviews.title: Love it ❤
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her kitchen it's big and the fridge has a light and the stove makes sounds.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: My little girl loves it! Definitely worth the price, it should last her a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Had 3-4 missing pieces including the decals
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Had 3-4 missing pieces including the decals. Called Amazon, they put me in touch with Step 2 and step 2 ordered the extra parts. Doesn't take that long to put together but kind of a pain when they have missing pieces. Lady at Step 2 was not overly friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Justin P

customer_reviews.title: The kitchen play set has tons of fun accessory pieces and realistic functions
customer_reviews.text: Got this for Christmas for my 2 year old grandson and he loves it. The kitchen play set has tons of fun accessory pieces and realistic functions!
customer_reviews.author: Karen R.

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is tall for a four year old and I wanted to get something that would last a few years. This is perfect! We separated the fridge to put in a different spot because it is a large kitchen but it works fine either way.
customer_reviews.author: RebeccaA

customer_reviews.title: Huge play kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Huge! Bought for my grandson age 2, this kitchen is so big and sturdy, he will enjoy this for the years to come
customer_reviews.author: jessica grimes

customer_reviews.title: Great... mostly
customer_reviews.text: Love how sturdy this unit is. Should last for years. The only thing I didn’t like was that many of the small parts listed in instructions were in bags with the food/dishes. Would have taken much less time to put together had I not had to sort through everything to find the pieces needed. Also, would have been nice to have some small screws to hold the shelves in frig and oven.
customer_reviews.author: Mona

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Love it! My kids love it! We are now currently buying all the Melissa and Doug food to go with it! My sister was also looking for a kitchen but wants one that could accommodate here cookie sheet from Melissa and Doug cookies and it fits no problem. The oven door doesn’t shut completely but you can barely tell! She will probably be buying her kids one too. Everyone who comes over loves the kitchen!!
customer_reviews.author: katrina

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on fb marketplace for $130. It's amazing. Plenty of storage. I have mine split up in 2 pieces and that saves space. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Bordom

product_meta.title: Step2 Elegant Edge Play Kitchen | Large Kids Kitchen Playset with Real Lights & Sounds | Over 70-Pc Play Food & Toy Accessories Set Included
product_meta.description: The modern and upscale Elegant Edge Kitchen playset has so many great features, it’ll make any adult want to play with it too! Toddlers can tend to their own kitchen with this spacious playset prepping play food on the large faux granite countertop, washing dishes in the farmhouse-style apron sink, and more. This elegant play kitchen was designed with luxury in mind, from the real working lights in the oven and refrigerator, to the premium “slate-style” appliance finishes and modern subway tile backsplash decals. Toddlers can whip up a delicious pretend meal with the oversized oven and stovetop featuring extra-large range controls, and quickly see which ingredients they have on hand in the large windowed refrigerator. This kitchen playset is an excellent choice for multi-child play to enhance any little chef’s imaginative and social skills. Made in the USA of US and imported parts.
feature_bullets: Kid-friendly luxury meets engaging social play and tons of fun with the Step2 Elegant Edge Kitchen pretend kitchen playset!
Junior chefs will love the upscale look and feel of this toddler play kitchen, from the realistic “slate-style” appliances to the large faux granite countertop and built-in storage.
Get cooking with the oversized oven and stovetop with extra-large clickable range controls, microwave, and deluxe refrigerator to keep all the ingredients fresh.
Fun electronic features add to the pretend play in this multi-child kitchen playset, like the real working lights in the oven and refrigerator, and the stovetop’s lights and sounds.
In the box: Play kitchen set, 78-piece accessory set.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars88 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
